actions.Multiattack: The hoplite makes three weapon attacks. It can replace one weapon attack with ray of frost.
actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.Ray of Frost (Cantrip): Ranged Spell Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the hoplite's next turn.
